strapiGuide.title: NWA Daily's Northwest Arkansas National Airport Route Guide
strapiGuide.description: Find your next flight from Northwest Arkansas National Airport (XNA). With service from six airlines flying out of Northwest Arkansas, including low-cost carriers Allegiant Air, Breeze Airways, and Frontier Airlines, you can choose the best option for your travel plans. XNA offers 22 nonstop flights to destinations across the United States.
strapiGuide.content:
Northwest Arkansas National Airport (XNA) is located in Northwest Arkansas and offers a range of flights from six different airlines: Allegiant Air, American Airlines, Breeze Airways, Delta Air Lines, Frontier Airlines, and United Airlines. Low-cost carriers Allegiant Air, Breeze Airways, and Frontier Airlines often bring fares down for the other three airlines. Allegiant Air, Breeze Airways, and Frontier Airlines are all low-cost carriers and periodically bring fares for the other three airlines down, sometimes by creating competition. 

Northwest Arkansas National Airport (XNA) currently has 22 nonstop flights to various destinations, including Atlanta, Austin, Charlotte, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Destin/Fort Walton, Fort Lauderdale, Houston, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, Minneapolis, Nashville, New Orleans, New York City, Orlando/Sanford, Phoenix/Mesa, Punta Gorda, St Pete/Clearwater, and Tampa.

By Airline: 

Allegiant 

Allegiant Air offers flights from Northwest Arkansas National Airport (XNA) to Austin (AUS), Destin/Fort Walton (VPS), Fort Lauderdale (FLL), Las Vegas (LAS), Los Angeles (LAX), Nashville (BNA), Orlando/Sanford (SFB), Phoenix/Mesa (AZA), Punta Gorda (PGD), and St Pete/Clearwater (PIE)

American 

﻿

American Airlines offers flights from Northwest Arkansas National Airport (XNA) to Charlotte (CLT), Chicago (ORD), Dallas Fort Worth (DFW), Los Angeles (LAX), Miami (MIA), New York City (LGA), and Washington DC (DCA).

Breeze 

﻿

Breeze Airways offers flights from Northwest Arkansas National Airport (XNA) to New Orleans (MSY) and Tampa (TPA).

Delta 

﻿

Delta Air Lines offers flights from Northwest Arkansas National Airport (XNA) to Atlanta (ATL), Minneapolis (MSP), and New York City (LGA).

Frontier 

﻿

Frontier Airlines offers flights from Northwest Arkansas National Airport (XNA) to Denver (DEN) and Las Vegas (LAS).

United 

United Airlines offers flights from Northwest Arkansas National Airport (XNA) to Chicago (ORD), Denver (DEN), and Houston (IAH).

Stay up to date

Airfares change with the economy, and schedules shift depending on the season. Fare Flight NWA is the region’s resource for the most insightful up-to-date information regarding all things traveling with Northwest Arkansas National Airport (XNA).
